item.title: PowerShell Windows Eventlog script
item.description: Here a new PowerShell report-event script. figure 1. Output reports-event script You can specify multiple servers in a text file, select how many hours from the current time to look in the eventlog and e-mail the HTML file after generation. The following syntax can be used: get-content c:\\script\\servers.txt | c:\\scripts\\report-event.ps1 – report c:\\script\\eventlog.
